comments.author: Kevin
comments.body: No ride for me today - I have a 1 PM meeting. How about going with something relatively flat on Thursday? I'm planning on riding that day and I'd like to still take it kinda easy with my gimpy knee.

comments.author: Dave
comments.body: I would be down for something flat (but only because I'm a wimp).

comments.author: Anonymous
comments.body: Wow, I never thought you'd actually admit that. We were all thinking it, but for you to actually come out and say it... I must say that I'm impressed. S (who would also be down for a flat ride on Thursday)

comments.author: Dave
comments.body: Egad. Someone masquerading as me... (today's second comment). Could it be Burton got a little break between shining his dress blacks and folding paper MIG's and got his mitts on the platoon computer? Flag was nice and quiet today. Almost no cars for a very nice change. Where was SB? The real DU
